&#3905;&#4018;&#3956;: [286] ... 1) gru mo'i sne nas mtheb chung rtsa ba'i tshigs bar gyi cha shas de la bskums khru gang dang/ gru mo'i sne nas gung mdzub kyi rtse mo bar gyi cha shas de la brkyangs khru gang zhes zer bas/ snga ma la sor nyi shu dang/ phyi ma la sor nyer bzhi mchis so/ ... 2) 'dul ba las gsal ba ltar na rang gi lus kyi spyi gtsug nas rkang mthil gyi bar dum bu bdun du btang ba'i dum bu gnyis kyi ring tshad cig  ...
cubit, distance from elbow to tips of fingers, 1/4 of a 'dom or fathom
1) cubit. [the size of 24 fingers, approx. 15-18 inches]. 2) two seventh's the length of one's own body. distance from the elbow to the tips of one's fingers. 3) pf. {khrud} to wash, to bathe
